structure.unit: E IMPLEMENTATION OF FEDERAL HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Reports available to public -- Protection of trade secrets.
law.text: Reports to the commission or committee shall be available to the public upon request in accordance with the provisions of KRS 61.870 to 61.884 relating to open records, if this information is not protected from release to the general public as a trade secret under federal law. Reasonable fees, consistent with KRS 61.874, may be charged for reproduction of these reports.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 80, effective July 15, 1998.
